{{Lang|'''Shikanoin Heizou'''|ja={{Rubi|鹿|しか|野|の|院|いん|平|へい|蔵|ぞう}}}} is a playable [[Anemo]] character in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

He's the number one [[Tenryou Commission]] detective, harbouring a rivalry with the [[Bantan Sango Detective Agency]]'s [[Sango]].
